PERSONA:
meet jacob, a 35-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. born and raised in the u.s., jacob identifies as a white non-hispanic and is a devout member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon), attending religious services once a week.

politically, jacob leans towards conservative values and considers himself an independent voter who generally supports the republican party. with a family income between $50,000 and $60,000, he falls into the middle-income tier and is registered to vote at his current address.

educationally, jacob has completed some college and holds an associate's degree. he is an active member of his community, frequently volunteering his time and efforts. in his personal life, jacob embraces an evangelical christian lifestyle and considers himself to be very conservative in his ideological beliefs.

technologically savvy, jacob uses the internet several times a day, keeping up with current events, news, and maintaining connections with others. overall, jacob is a family-oriented, religious, and politically engaged individual who values his community, beliefs, and conservative principles.
